entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
